name: Aris Anagnostopoulos
content: Aris Anagnostopoulos - Home HomeResearch interestsPublicationsTeachingOther activitiesFor studentsContact Home Aris Anagnostopoulos I am a Professor at the Department of Computer, Control, and Management Engineering (Dipartimento di Ingegneria Informatica, Automatica, e Gestionale) at Sapienza University of Rome. Before joining Sapienza University I was a postdoc at Yahoo! Research in Santa Clara, CA. Gong back, I obtained my Ph.D. in Computer Science at Brown University, and before that I obtained an Sc.M. degree in Applied Mathematics and an Sc.M degree in Computer Science from Brown University. I did my undergraduate studies at the Computer Engineering and Informatics department of the University of Patras. My research work is in the design and analysis of algorithms, with applications on various areas of data mining and data science.
